title: Strengthening Nursing Practice Competencies: Training Instructional Design Experts Using Program-Based Response Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can apply instructional design principles with over 85% accuracy by actively responding (type/cover) to the program framework.
Learners can construct elements of a new educational program with 100% accuracy by adhering to program design rules.
Learners can continuously improve their instructional design competencies by analyzing formative assessment results.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
